davi@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 20309
Solaris 2.8+ fdatasync is part of the Realtime Extensions library.

Comment on attachment 20309
Solaris 2.8+ fdatasync is part of the Realtime Extensions library.

SunOS 5.9 fdatasync man page:

SYNOPSIS

     cc [ flag... ] file... -lrt [ library... ]
     #include <unistd.h>

     int fdatasync(int fildes);

...

Realtime Library Functions			   fdatasync(3RT)
